name: Beaked The Cultist
description:
Adds Beaked the Cultist as a new playable character.
BEAKED REQUIRES THE STSLIB MOD!

0.6.4
- Sacred Deck no longer Super-Rare.

0.6.3
- Sacrifice Doll relic art (Ashe)
- New Character Select button art (Ashe)

If you contributed and don't see your name in the credits, please let us know!
